name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: These are great t shirts, well made and good size.Washed well and did not shrink at all. Would recommend.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Great deal on a genuine Hanes product.Next day delivery.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Even unwrapping these t-shirts I knew they were going to be big. Upon donning them I was right, they are huge. In fact I bought another brand at the same time also in XXL and laying one on top of the other showed a significant difference in size. The Hanes Beefy shirts are at least 3XL using other makes as a guide. It's not a huge issue, I wear tees in winter for layering, but they're so big they look daggy at the neck, the only part that shows. Made in Haiti so it's gratifying to see manufacturing in poor countries adjacent to the US. They are thick as advertised, but in the absence of significant shrinkage I'd go a size down, hoping of course that the size difference is consistent across the Hanes Beefy range (i.e. one size too big). The image shown has Aquagard T-shirts in XXL on top of the Hanes in XXL and the difference is significant- and the yellow shirts were larger than other XXL tees I've purchased recently.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Nice t.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: I bought both types of these tshirts and the not beefy ones are a bit see through. Not these  ones. Well sized and comfortable.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Great quality but I ordered large which is my usual size in Europe/Australia and they are way too big - too long by 10 cms, and the shoulders are far too wide and the arm holes are huge. The only area they fit is across the chest. Returned.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Hanes Beefy T has always been a nostalgic recognised brand and good to see time has not diminished that view, heavy weight cotton, great fit and well finished.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: These are comfortable and long-wearing t-shirts.  Perfect for wearing with jeans or under a casual shirt with chinos.  Recommended.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: The quality is always good with Haynes T-Shirts but the sizing is terrible. I ordered XL and they are 48" chest size and not 42-44". Very disappointed.Gary Playfoot

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: The only ones you can be sure will keep their neck shape

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Great boxy fit at 2XL on 6’3”

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: I ordered  2 different colours in XL - red and blue.  They arrived seperately and the red was manufactured in Ethiopia while the blue was manufactured in Haiti. I have been wearing and washing both colours for a few months and find that the red has way too big a neck opening  compared to the blue and hence does not feel as good a fit around the neck and shoulder area making me not want to wear the red at all.I am very happy with the quality of the fabric and really like the Haynes beefy T's , but I am now wary of ordering some more as I dont know which colour/manufacturer combinations are which.You should expect consistent quality between the manufacturing locations.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: I like Beefy-T tee shirts but the sizes keep changing.I had a 3XL with perfect fit, then bought two more 3XLs which fit like 4XLs.Won't be buying T-shirts from Amazon again.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Way too big, American sizes seem to be 4x bigger than Australian sizes. Sleeves nearly come down to my wrists. Price to return them costs more than the shirts.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Very disappointed. These t-shirts were only about cotton 60% cotton and consequently felt terrible and didn’t tighten up to fit the body after being washed and soften up like the old Hanes Beefy Ts did. I threw them out.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: An old school quality T thicker than most well made pre shrunk and true to size - not so much of a vest type T unless your layering in colder climates or it’s an under open shirt type situation

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Hanes beefy t , fits great,  thick cotton. not quite as I remember them as the neck collar is a little larger than I thought, but none the less good shirt

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Excellent quality, great fit

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Perfect

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: My husband was frustrated with other brands of T-Shirts being too thin and thus, not very attractive to wear out and about.  I suggested he try a Hanes Beefy-T, so he got a white one and loves it so much, I've purchased several in different colors for his Christmas gift.  As well made and long-wearing as these are, he should be set for quite some time.  Beefy-Ts are, without a doubt, the absolute best T-Shirts you can buy, and you definitely won't regret the purchase.  These are all cotton, so if you're vacillating about which size to buy, go with the larger one just to be sure it'll stiff fit beautifully after going through the washer and dryer.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: I seldom wear t-shirts for anything other than walking the dog and sleeping in.  I dislike the seams, tags and stretching that after a short while distorts the fit and thus the look of the shirt.  The heavy Beefy-T has none of the aforementioned issues.  It's extremely well made with just the right weight fabric to resist stretching AND tagless.  The fabric wears like iron to the point where the neckline of my favorite Beffy-T sleep shirt wore through after 8 years use before requiring replacement.  If you're buying expensive T-shirts from American  Apparel of the like you are wasting large sums of money.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: And the beefy is good for colder weather, or to wear as a t-shirt rather than undershirt

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Proper length, fit and material for beefy t's.Lately some beefy's have been a bit short and made from cheaper material, but not these!

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Wanted a good quality t-shirt that actually fitted me, and that is what I recieved. I am about 5'9 and ordered a medium. The t-shirts themselves are not exactly a thick material, but they're not thin, they feel smooth. If there was one thing I would say, it's that they are a tiny bit too long on the torso, not as bad as some t-shirts that claim to be a medium, but it would be the perfect t-shirt, if it wasn't just that inch too long on the torso (but this is just my preference, I prefer a shorter torso length on a t-shirt).
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 14 October 2023

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Exactly what it says it is short is thicker, good quality and comfortable.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: This has to be the most comfortable T-shirt  I have ever worn.  The fit was good and it appears to be well made since I've only worn the shirt a few times.  Held up well in the wash

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: I bought these for my husband months ago and they are still in great shape. He works for a tree company and his clothes generally get ripped, stained, and ruined after just a few weeks (and many times, days!)These two shirts are worn at least once or twice per week, while working, and are in the same shape as when I bought them. There are no holes or rips anywhere on the shirts and they are just as strong as when I received them. Stains are impossible to avoid, but the shirt couldn't be of better quality and durability even months after purchasing them.The color and description are the same as pictured and described by the seller.This is a great deal on two high quality Men's short sleeved t-shirts, and I would definitively recommend them!I bought these shirts at full price. When I'm very satisfied with a purchase, I like to give a review and hopefully help or answer some questions potential buyers may have.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: Excellent color on this t-shirt, and heavy enough to be worn as a regular shirt. Don't recommend this if you plan on using it as a layer.

name: Hanes Men's Short Sleeve Beefy T (Pack of 2)
reviews: This is a great t-shirt if you get the right size. I had to try three different sizes! If you normally buy tall sizes, don't get these in a tall size unless you're really tall, like at least 6'8" or taller. Regardless of your size, buy one size larger unless you prefer a snug to tight fit. They are made from "100% preshrunk cotton," but believe me, they do shrink a size after a normal washing and drying. I appreciate that they are 100% cotton, nothing with polyester ever feels as good, and the material is indeed "Beefy." I will probably buy more now that I know what size I need.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 22 January 2023
